ofx:section.ofx:title: Revisions

l:item.name: View
l:item.ofx:paragraph: A view specifies from which point of view revisions are shown. One example for a view may be a user who has changed something or the project where the changes belong to.

l:item.name: Scope
l:item.ofx:paragraph: A scope represents a category where a entity belongs to.

l:item.name: Entity
l:item.ofx:paragraph: A entity is representing a object.

l:item.name: View Mapping
l:item.ofx:paragraph: Each view can contain different entities. The individual scope of each entity needs to be specified.

l:item.name: Entity Mapping
l:item.ofx:paragraph: Each entity can be mapped to a specific scope. The object path to the scope needs to be specified.
